short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track top cryptocurrency prices in real-time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crypti - Crypto Price Tracker is a streamlined app for monitoring real-time cryptocurrency prices. 

Designed with a clean and user-friendly interface, Crypti allows users to easily view and track the latest price updates of popular cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Cardano, and more. 

With a focus on simplicity, Crypti provides essential market data without unnecessary features, allowing users to focus on the current values of their favorite coins.

Features 1.1:

- View real-time prices of top cryptocurrencies
- Search for specific cryptocurrencies with ease
- Pin your favorite cryptocurrencies for quick access
